coverLetter:
Dear Hiring Manager,


I'm applying for a position at your company. Based on the posted description, I'm confident that I am fully qualified for the position and will be a strong addition to your team. I would appreciate a job interview at your earliest convenience. 


Please find my resume attached.


I can be reached at the number above or at my email address.



Sincerely, Julian Nunez
additionalInfo: hard working and 100% dependable and looking to start my career in the mmj industry
